SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reports

Class SecurityPositionByCurrencyGrandSummaryReport

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reports.SecurityPositionSummaryReport
grafioschtrader.reports.SecurityPositionByCurrencyGrandSummaryReport
@Component public class SecurityPositionByCurrencyGrandSummaryReport extends SecurityPositionSummaryReport
Creates the report for the security accounts. It supports the tree levels, that means all security accounts of a tenant or one or more security account for a portfolio and a certain security account.
